TopicTitle: The Transform Tool in VAB is annoying

Articles.Content:
I think there are two main problems:

1. The arrows are too big and too thick, and sometimes they obstruct the parts, this is really annoying. Much thinner and more transparent arrows will be fine. Adaptive size when zooming will be better.

2. There's no notification which axis is selected. Sometimes I have to move my mouse to see which axis I select.
